kDesc
What a marksman! You're almost as good as Nathan Drake. . . Almost. [#Legal]
Quel tireur d'élite ! Vous êtes presque aussi doué que Nathan Drake. . . presque. [#Legal]
Was für ein Schütze! Du bist fast so gut wie Nathan Drake ... fast. [#Legal]
Che cecchino! Sei bravo quasi quanto Nathan Drake. . .quasi. [#Legal]
¡Menuda puntería! Casi estás a la altura de Nathan Drake. . . casi. [#Legal]
*Not Localised* Dragunov [#Legal]
훌륭한 사격 실력입니다! 거의 드레이크만큼 잘 쏘는군요. [#Legal]
What a marksman! You're almost as good as Nathan Drake. . . Almost. [#Legal]
你真是神射手！你幾乎跟奈森‧德瑞克一樣出色了. . .幾乎。 [#Legal]
你真是神射手！你幾乎跟奈森‧德瑞克一樣出色了. . .幾乎。 [#Legal]
